summary: Migrated checkpoint operations from 8 skills to 6 commands, establishing command-level checkpoint pattern. Archived SubagentStop hook infrastructure. Updated CLAUDE.md and created checkpoint-in-commands pattern documentation.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary with full details of skills migrated, commands updated, and verification results

completion_data.completion_summary: Migrated checkpoint operations from skills to commands across the entire .claude/ system. 8 skills converted to thin wrappers, 6 commands updated with full checkpoint pattern, SubagentStop hook archived, and comprehensive documentation created.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated CLAUDE.md Checkpoint-Based Execution Model and Skill Architecture sections, created checkpoint-in-commands.md pattern doc, updated thin-wrapper-skill.md, created archive/README.md

next_steps: Test commands with real tasks to verify checkpoint execution reliability
